alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County Southeast; Palo Verde Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 6:18PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Imperial County through 645 PM PDT... At 618 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles southwest of Cibola, or 31 miles northwest of Martinez Lake. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Imperial County. This includes CA Route 78 between mile markers 48 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County Southeast; Palo Verde Valley
